document_data.name: Samara's Scrimshaw
document_data.mainbody: '''Samara's Scrimshaw''' was a [[scrimshaw]] shop in the city of [[Ravens Bluff]].
document_data.Location: This store was situated in the [[Ravens Bluff/Silverscales|Silverscales]], a neighborhood in the [[Harbor District (Ravens Bluff)|Harbor District]] of Ravens Bluff.
document_data.Services: Starting as a small business, by {{Yearlink|1370}} Samara's Scrimshaw was a very busy and successful shop. It emplyed up to twenty [[gnome]] carvers to meet the demand of their bulk business. They provided scrimshaw to businesses in [[Sembia]], [[Turmish]] and the [[Vilhon Reach]]. The gnome carvers turned bones, shells, teeth and tusks into various types of decorative items. Common products included coffers, handheld mirrors and hairbrushes.
